|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/11/2019 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43684; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad2ax = 1148 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Netgear refers to this device as AX6000 capable but the FCC test report documents only claim up to 1150+2402 (AX3500) since only HE80 channel bandwidths are currently supported. Netgear will probably issue a Class II Product Change Request at a later date to add 160 MHz channels allowing it to claim to be AX6000.
2x2 DOCSIS 3.1 & 32x8 DOCSIS 3.0
{{FCC ST|02/08/2020}}
* Web GUI: http://www.routerlogin.net *[[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems#DOCSIS 3.1 cable modems]] <!--"Controlling software (Mtool [v3.1.0.3] has been activated to set the EUT under transmission condition continuously at specific channel frequency."--> <!-- Netgear refers to this device as AX6000 capable but the FCC test report documents only claim up to 1150+2402 (AX3500) since only HE80 channel bandwidths are currently supported. Netgear will probably issue a Class II Product Change Request at a later date to add 160MHz channels allowing it to claim to be AX6000. -->
==See also== :;[[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] • [[Netgear Nighthawk Devices]] *[[Netgear CAX30 (Nighthawk AX6)]] - AX2700 WiFi Cable Modem Router :FCC ID: PY319300461 (2020-07-06) - Nighthawk AX6 *[[Netgear CAX80 (Nighthawk CAX8)]] - AX6000 WiFi Cable Modem Router :FCC ID: PY319200447 (2019-10-24) - Nighthawk AX8 *[[Netgear EAX80 (Nighthawk AX8)]] - AX6000 WiFi Mesh Extender :FCC ID: PY319100440 (2019-09-10) - Nighthawk AX8 *[[Netgear EAX20]] - AX1800 WiFi Mesh Extender :FCC ID: PY319300460 (2019-12-13) *[[Netgear WAX610]] • WiFi 6 AX1800 Access Point :FCC ID: PY320200497 (2020-05-11) - 12V/2.5A *[[Netgear WAX610Y]] • WiFi 6 AX1800 Outdoor Access Point :FCC ID: PY320200498 (2020-07-12) - (WAX610Y/NA)
